name: Docker Compose: OTEL Collector + Loki + Tempo
description: Compose stack for otel-collector, Loki (logs), Tempo (traces).

files.template:
version: '3.9'
services:
  otel:
    image: otel/opentelemetry-collector
    volumes: [ './otel-config.yaml:/etc/otelcol/config.yaml' ]
    ports: [ '4318:4318' ]
  loki:
    image: grafana/loki:2.9.0
    ports: [ '3100:3100' ]
  tempo:
    image: grafana/tempo:latest
    ports: [ '3200:3200' ]
